title: BRIEF-Charles Schwab Says Total Client Assets As Of Month-End January Up 23 Pct To $3.48 Trillion
text: February 14, 2018 / 2:01 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-Charles Schwab Says Total Client Assets As Of Month-End January Up 23 Pct To $3.48 Trillion Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Charles Schwab Corp: * SCHWAB REPORTS MONTHLY ACTIVITY HIGHLIGHTS * CHARLES SCHWAB CORP - TOTAL CLIENT ASSETS WERE $3.48 TRILLION AS OF MONTH-END JANUARY, UP 23% FROM JANUARY 2017 * CHARLES SCHWAB CORP - NEW BROKERAGE ACCOUNTS TOTALED 165,000 IN JANUARY 2018, UP 49% FROM JANUARY 2017 * CHARLES SCHWAB - CORE NET NEW ASSETS BROUGHT TO CO BY NEW AND EXISTING CLIENTS IN JANUARY 2018 TOTALED $18.7 BILLION * CHARLES SCHWAB CORP - NET NEW ASSETS EXCLUDING ALL MUTUAL FUND CLEARING FLOWS TOTALED $17.7 BILLION IN JANUARY 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
